channel.title: Making A blurrs client Disconnection problem
channel.description: the title says it all, when i log on to a blurrs client i get disconnected for some reason and i want to fix so it is delta source compatible.. ¬¬¬¬¬¬¬¬¬¬¬¬¬¬COWBELL¬¬¬¬¬¬¬¬¬¬¬¬¬

item.title: Making A blurrs client Disconnection problem
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

cowbell:

i cant find the model folder where is it on blurrs?

Make a model folder urself they work automatic
Just do right click , NEW MAP , Name it “models”
lol thx for reps i guess cuz i got 20 morei n 1 day? how lol amazing

Georgio

item.title: Making A blurrs client Disconnection problem
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“cowbell, post:8, topic:279432”]its ok, but i want a to be able to log on to it without getting disconnected on blurrs and be able to play on a delta client.
any1 got any ideas?[/quote]

Yeah me le me search ok

Georgio[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 22, 2009, 03:20:35 am[/size][hr][quote=“georges”][quote author=cowbell link=topic=368761.msg2794415#msg2794415 date=1242979704]
its ok, but i want a to be able to log on to it without getting disconnected on blurrs and be able to play on a delta client.
any1 got any ideas?
[/quote]

Yeah me le me search ok

Georgio[/quote]

U know what , use this source + client : Check this Pwnscape : http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,357580.0.html ITS verry good
Or this Woeshiescape : http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,357948.0.html I Rather To DL this!
or This one xD: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,350040.0.html THEE UNDERGROUND Verry good to but bit old

Those are the THREE Delta’s i fucking like xD! i mixed those 3 in one + my old source , to get a good working base

or else just use client xD!
Goodluck Georgio

item.title: Making A blurrs client Disconnection problem
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Here : this is all copied from blure xD ;D

[quote=“bluurr, post:1, topic:278365”]If you get this error

[/CENTER]

Add this to your server

open player.java

add

public int skulls = 0;
public int hint = 0;

find

playerProps.writeByte(headIcon);

make it look like

playerProps.writeByte(skulls);
playerProps.writeByte(hint);
playerProps.writeByte(headIcon);

The client is based of the 317 deop many months ago.

Final download link

http://bluurr.co.uk/files/bluurrs%20client.zip DL LINK[/quote]

lol enjoy BLUURR MADE IT!! not me!

Georgio

Read full topic
